subject: Football
Gambling
lead_paragraph: Bookmakers remained skeptical about the Panthers’ 13-0 record, making them only 4-point favorites in the opening betting line for their game against the 6-7 Giants.
snippet: Bookmakers remained skeptical about the Panthers’ 13-0 record, making them only 4-point favorites in the opening betting line for their game against the 6-7 Giants.
